set.name: DM23-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Disrespectful! Knights of the Evil Eye

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Zombie Dragon/Dark Lord/Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each player chooses one of their creatures and puts the rest of their creatures into their owner's mana zone. ■ Each turn, when one of your shields leaves your shield zone for the first time, each opponent chooses one of their shields. This may break all of the chosen shields. ■ Your opponent's creatures attack if able.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped, then return up to 2 cards from your mana zone to your hand. ■ Whenever you or one of your creatures is attacked for the first time each turn, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have a Dispector, you may choose both: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 8 or less and put it into its owner's mana zone: ► Put a creature that costs 8 or less from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, choose one of the following: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn: ► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

That creature can't attack this turn.) {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.) ■ While summoning a Partner, you may tap this card in your mana zone as if it had all civilizations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck. If you do, put one into your graveyard and put the rest into your mana zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put up to one creature from your mana zone and/or graveyard that have total cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone. ■ While this creature is tapped, you can't be attacked.
